Te damos la bienvenida al Sistema de Control de Planeaciones Docente

{{ course?.year }}

{{ career?.curso }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Courses } from 'src/app/shared/model/courses.model'; import { CoursesService } from 'src/app/shared/services/courses/courses.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.scss'] }) export class DashboardComponent implements OnInit { public courses = [ { year: '2024' }, { year: '2023' }, { year: '2022' } ]; public coursesList: any; constructor(private coursesSrv: CoursesService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getListCourses(); } private getListCourses() { this.coursesSrv.getCoursesList().subscribe((course: Courses) => { if(course) { this.coursesList = course; } }) } }
